msg: Add changelog entries for r516561 and r516564 (both concerning changes to log messages).

author: ate
msg: - AFAIK the last required src file (which includes docs) header change to be compliant to the above new rules.
Next and final action: adding appropriate NOTICE (and third-party LICENSE files) where needed

author: ate
msg: Remove archive of Apache Portals site: the Apache Portals site is maintained in svn itself, so no need to keep an (out-of-date) archive under Jetspeed

author: ate
msg: Remove JSR-168 portlet-api from our svn repository:
no need (nor right) to have that ourselves as its publicly available (under SUN license) and we were not using it (anymore) anyway.
